message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_FV_SERVICE_RECIPIENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: At least one Service Recipient must be selected.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_FV_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Service must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_FV_COVER_PERIOD_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Cover Period Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_FV_SENSITIVITY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Sensitivity must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_FV_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Number of Units must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SUBMITSERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_PROVIDER_MANDATORY
message.locale: A provider must be selected before submitting the service.

message.name: ERR_SUBMITSERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_PROVIDER_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A provider type must be selected before submitting the service.

message.name: ERR_SUBMITSERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_PROVIDER_OR_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A provider or provider type must be selected before submitting the service.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_NO_OWNER_ENTERED
message.locale: You must select a user to be the owner of the Service.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_TWO_OWNERS_SELECTED
message.locale: You can only select one user to be the owner of the Service.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XRV_SENSITIVITY_LEVEL_HIGHER_THAN_PROPOSED_OWNER
message.locale: The sensitivity level of the Service cannot be greater than the sensitivity of the proposed owner of the Service.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_SERVICE_COVER_PERIOD_END_DATE_BEFORE_COVER_PERIOD_START_DATE
message.locale: The Cover Period End Date must not be earlier than the Cover Period Start Date.

message.name: ERR_READOWNERDETAILS_XRV_FAILED_TO_READ_OWNERS_USER_DETAILS
message.locale: Attempt to read owner details failed.

message.name: ERR_CANCELSERVICEOFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_DELIVERY_NOT_DELIVERED_EXIST_CANNOT_CANCEL_OFFERING_TILL_DELIVERY_CANCELED
message.locale: Service record(s) exist for the service offering that have not been delivered. The associated service(s) must be canceled first before the service offering can be canceled.
Service record(s) exist for the service offering that have not been delivered. The associated service(s) must be cancelled first before the service offering can be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CANCELSERVICEOFFERING_XRV_DELIVERED_SERVICE_DELIVERY_EXIST_CANNOT_CANCEL_OFFERING
message.locale: Units have been delivered for the associated service. The service offering cannot be canceled.
Units have been delivered for the associated service. The service offering cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_SERVICE_RECIPIENT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Service Recipients cannot be modified when the status is Not Started, In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_PROVIDER_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Provider cannot be modified when the status is Not Started, In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_PROVIDER_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Provider Type cannot be modified when the status is Not Started, In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_BOTH_PROVIDER_AND_PROVIDER_TYPE_ENTERED
message.locale: Both provider and provider type cannot be entered for a service.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_COVER_PERIOD_START_DATE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Cover Period Start Date cannot be modified when the status of the service is In Progress or Completed

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_COVER_PERIOD_END_DATE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Cover Period End Date cannot be modified when the status of the service is Completed.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Number of Units cannot be modified when the status of the service is Completed.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_FREQUENCY_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Frequency cannot be modified when the status is Not Started, In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FREQUENCY_UNMODIFIABLE_CONFIGURATION
message.locale: Frequency has been configured for the Service '%1s' and it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_AUTHORIZED_RATE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Authorized rate cannot be modified when the status of the service is Completed.
Authorised rate cannot be modified when the status of the service is Completed.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Outcome cannot be modified if the service status is In Progress.

message.name: ERR_UPDATESERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_SET_TO_ATTAINED_NOT_ATTAINED
message.locale: Outcome can only be set to Attained or Not Attained when the status is Completed.

message.name: ERR_CANCELSERVICEDELIVERY_XFV_SERVICE_DELIVERY_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED_IN_CURRNET_STATE
message.locale: The Service cannot be canceled if the status is 'In Progress' or 'Completed'.
The Service cannot be cancelled if the status is 'In Progress' or 'Completed'.

message.name: ERR_CANCELSERVICEDELIVERY_XRV_NOTES_EXIST
message.locale: The Service cannot be canceled as notes have been recorded for it.
The Service cannot be cancelled as notes have been recorded for it.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERY_XRV_SERVICE_DELIVERY_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_CLIENT_FOR_SERVICE
message.locale: An active Service already exists for one of the selected recipients for this service.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATE_BEFORE_COVER_PERIOD_START_DATE
message.locale: The end date on the selected service - %1d is earlier than the cover period start date for the service delivery - %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_START_DATE_AFTER_COVER_PERIOD_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date on the selected service - %1d is later than the cover period start date specified - %2d. The cover period start date must be on or after the service start date.

message.name: INF_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATE_BEFORE_COVER_PERIOD_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date, %1d, on the selected service offering is before the cover period end date, %2d, specified on this service.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_CANCELLED_CANNOT_CREATE_SERVICE_DELIVERY
message.locale: The selected service is canceled. A service delivery cannot be create for a canceled service.
The selected service is cancelled. A service delivery cannot be create for a cancelled service.

message.name: SERVICE_DELIVERY_SUBMIT_SUBJECT
message.locale: A %1s service for client(s) %2s requires approval.

message.name: SERVICE_DELIVERY_APPROVED_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: Service %1s for client(s) %2s has been approved.

message.name: SERVICE_DELIVERY_REJECTED_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: Service %1s for client(s) %2s has been rejected.

message.name: ERR_FV_MINUTES_LESS_THAN_SIXTY
message.locale: The Minutes, %1n, must be less than 60.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEGATIVE_HOURS_DURATION
message.locale: The Hours, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEGATIVE_MINUTES_DURATION
message.locale: The Minutes, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FREQUENCY_DURATION_MANDATORY_AS_CLIENT_PARTICIPATION_SET_ON_SERVICE
message.locale: The Frequency and Duration must be entered as Client Participation is defined on this service.

message.name: ERR_XRV_COVER_PERIOD_MANDATORY_AS_FREQUENCY_SET_ON_SERVICE
message.locale: The Cover Period End Date must be entered as Frequency for the service is specified.

message.name: INF_UNITS_DELIVERED_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: %1n of %2n.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SCHEDULED_FROM_TO_INVALID
message.locale: The 'From' and 'To' dates must be within the service date range (%1d - %2d).

message.name: ERR_XFV_SCHEDULED_FREQUENCY_BLANK
message.locale: Scheduled attendance can not be recorded for a service that doesn't have a frequency.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SCHEDULED_DURATION_BLANK
message.locale: Scheduled attendance can not be recorded for a service that doesn't have a duration.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_SCHEDULED_OCCURENCES_FOUND_WITHIN_RANGE_ATTENDNCE
message.locale: The scheduled attendance cannot be recorded as the client is/was not scheduled to attend during the period specified.

message.name: INFO_NUM_SCHEDULED_OCCURANCES_RECORDED
message.locale: Based on the frequency of the service. %1n attendance record(s) have been created for the period %2d - %3d.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARTICIPATION_ID_MANDATORY_ENTERED
message.locale: The following information is mandatory when recording participation: CaseID, ConcernRoleID, ServiceDeliveryID.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PARTICIPATION_DATE_OUTSIDE_SERVICE_DATE_RANGE
message.locale: The participation dates must be within the service date range (%1d - %2d).

message.name: INFO_PARTICIPATION_DATE_NOT_SCHEDULED_DATE
message.locale: The date entered does not fall on a scheduled participation date.

message.name: INFO_TIME_ENTERED_NOT_SCHEDULED_TIME
message.locale: The time entered does not match the scheduled time of (%1n:%2s) for the service.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PARTICIPATION_ALREADY_ENTERED
message.locale: Participation has already been recorded for %1s (%2s) on the %3d.

message.name: ERR_FV_FEDERAL_ALLOWABLE_COMPONENTS_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICE_THEREFORE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The %1s service is associated with federal allowable components, therefore a federal allowable component must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROJECTED_DATE_RANGE_NOT_STARTED
message.locale: The Projected Attendance Start Date must be specified if the Projected Attendance End date is specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROJECTED_DATE_RANGE_INVALID
message.locale: The Projected Attendance End Date, %2d, must be on or later than the Projected Attendance Start Date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROJECTED_DATE_RANGE_NOT_ENDED
message.locale: The Projected Attendance End Date must be specified if the Projected Attendance Start date is specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLETION_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Completion Comments entered are too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_FV_REASON_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The reason entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: Reason must be specified when the Outcome is set to 'Unsuccessful'.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_REASON_NOT_APPLICABLE_OUTCOME_SUCCESSFUL
message.locale: Reason can only be specified if the Outcome is set to 'Unsuccessful'.

message.name: INFO_END_DATE_PERIOD_PAID_FOR
message.locale: A payment has already been made for a period after the specified cover period end date. Payments have been made up to %1d.

message.name: INFO_END_DATE_BEFORE_RECORDED_ATTENDANCE_DATE
message.locale: Client participation has already been recorded up to %1d.

message.name: ERR_FV_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICE_NAME_OR_KEYWORDS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Either Service Name or Keywords must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ONLY_ONE_SERVICE_NAME_OR_KEYWORDS
message.locale: Only one of Service Name or Keywords can be entered.

message.name: NUM_SESSIONS_REMAINING
message.locale: (%1n sessions remaining)

message.name: INF_ACTION_BY_STRING
message.locale: %1d by

message.name: INFO_SERVICE_DELIVERY_REVERTED_FROM_COMPLETED_TO_INPROGRESS
message.locale: The %1s service status reverted from 'Completed' to 'In Progress'.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_DELIVERED_SERVICE
message.locale: The end date cannot be earlier than the date on which a service has already been delivered'.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date cannot be changed to a date later than the existing end date.
